articles.title: The Galaxy Ring keeps you in Samsung’s orbit - The Verge
articles.description: The $399.99 Samsung Galaxy Ring isn’t a revolutionary smart ring, but it does a good job of convincing you to stay within Samsung’s gadget ecosystem.
articles.content:
Its not so much a standalone health tracker or a smartwatch alternative as an accessory for your Galaxy Watch.
